DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Connectivity Basic
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Connection information between two <elements> as a logical connection without providing the connection feature, the connection type, or realizing elements (fasteners, etc.) for the connection.</elements>

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Connectivity Path
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Connection information between two <elements> with an optional connection geometry describing the connection feature as end caps (to trim the element's footprint profile at the connection ends).</elements>

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Connectivity Realized
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Connection information between two _elements_or between an _element_and another _element_as a connection including the link the realizing elements (fasteners, etc.) that establish this connection physically.

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Connectivity Is Realization
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: The _element_is used within a connectivity relationship, represented by _IfcRelConnectsWithRealizingElement_, as one of the _RealizingElements_.
